thread.title_full: Watch: Woman trips over her outfit, drops her baby to death - Khaleej Times

author: Web Report
title: Watch: Woman trips over her outfit, drops her baby to death - Khaleej Times
text: Watch: Woman trips over her outfit, drops her baby to death Web Report /Uzbekistan Filed on February 1, 2017 Share Vote The mother stumbled when her outfit got stuck in the escalator A baby fell to death from 40 feet after the mother accidently lost grip on the child. The mother stumbled when her outfit got stuck in the escalator causing the baby fall to from a height. According to the Daily Mail, the incident took place in a shopping center in Uzbekistan. The CCTV footage of the incident shows the mother wearing a long dress and head scarf. The woman carries the baby on her right arm while holding the older child with her left hand. Suddenly, the woman stumbles apparently as her dress gets stuck in the escalator. She loses grip on the child who falls from about 40 feet on tiled flooring. The emergency crew who came to the spot was unable to save the child. Share
